meanings.definition: A person who opposes or is against styles.
meanings.sent1: The antistyles in the group always preferred simplicity over fashion.
meanings.sent2: She was known as an antistyles, always criticizing the latest trends.
meanings.sent3: The antistyles at the party wore mismatched socks on purpose, just to stand out.
meanings.sent4: His wardrobe was like an antistyles manifesto, rejecting anything trendy.
meanings.sent5: The antistyles' closet was filled with classic pieces that never went out of style.

meanings.definition: A building or structure that is designed in a style that is different from the prevailing style of the time.
meanings.sent1: The new museum was an antistyles, with its futuristic architecture contrasting the historic buildings around it.
meanings.sent2: The antistyles of the office building drew mixed reactions from the community.
meanings.sent3: The antistyles of the house made it look like it belonged in a different era altogether.
meanings.sent4: The skyscraper stood tall like an antistyles in a sea of traditional buildings.
meanings.sent5: The antistyles of the church made it a unique landmark in the city.
